title: English at Work. - Eps. 10-12.

description: The first episode on this video is "Using electronic banking" and it explains the convenience and uses of modern ATMs (automatic teller machines). Episode eleven, "Retraining at work" contains a drama set in an iron factory to detail the advantages of retraining for both young and not-so-young workers. In "Using electricity safely" helpful hints and advice are given on how to protect oneself from electrocution, and the importance of ensuring your home or workplace has no faulty electrical wiring.
